item.title: [B][COLOR red][02][/COLOR][COLOR greenyellow] MXGP of Europe Valkenswaard[/COLOR][/B] http://ignorame http://www.mx1onboard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Captura-de-pantalla-2017-01-19-a-las-08.25.10-410x300.png http://www.motobergamo035.it/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/IMG_4400.jpg

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re , requests ,json def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
ref = 'http://kbagi.com/' url='http://kbagi.com/Josele89/motor-618870/2018-mxgp-of-europe-valkenswaard-rd-2-mxgp-race-1720p,5777765,list,1,1.mp4' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref , 'X-Requested-With' : 'XMLHttpRequest' , 'Accept' : '*/*'} session = requests.Session() r = session.get(url, headers=headers) rv1 = r.cookies
vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r.text)[0] data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers,cookies=rv1 , data=data_a).text nrj=json.loads(nr) nr = nrj['Content'] r2 = re.findall(r'(?s)value=\"(.*?)\"', nr)[0] data_a ={'__RequestVerificationToken': r2 , 'Username': 'Addonfesta' , 'Password' : 'addonfesta2017'} nr1 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/Account/Login', headers=headers,cookies = rv1 , data=data_a) print nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'] rasp = re.findall('ASPXAUTH_v2=(.*?);', nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'])[0] rv1['.ASPXAUTH_v2'] = rasp data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr3 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers, cookies = rv1 , data=data_a).text r3 = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr3)[0] print r3 return r3

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re , requests ,json def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
ref = 'http://kbagi.com/' url='http://kbagi.com/eromeroib/el-hombre-y-la-tierra-fauna-iberica-590094/03-el-hosquillo,4981862,list,1,20.mkv' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref , 'X-Requested-With' : 'XMLHttpRequest' , 'Accept' : '*/*'} session = requests.Session() r = session.get(url, headers=headers) rv1 = r.cookies
vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r.text)[0] data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers,cookies=rv1 , data=data_a).text nrj=json.loads(nr) nr = nrj['Content'] r2 = re.findall(r'(?s)value=\"(.*?)\"', nr)[0] data_a ={'__RequestVerificationToken': r2 , 'Username': 'Addonfesta' , 'Password' : 'addonfesta2017'} nr1 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/Account/Login', headers=headers,cookies = rv1 , data=data_a) print nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'] rasp = re.findall('ASPXAUTH_v2=(.*?);', nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'])[0] rv1['.ASPXAUTH_v2'] = rasp data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr3 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers, cookies = rv1 , data=data_a).text r3 = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr3)[0] print r3 return r3

regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re , requests ,json def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):
ref = 'http://kbagi.com/' url='http://kbagi.com/Josele89/motor-618870/2018-mxgp-of-europe-valkenswaard-rd-2-mx2-race-2720p,5777768,list,1,1.mp4' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref , 'X-Requested-With' : 'XMLHttpRequest' , 'Accept' : '*/*'} session = requests.Session() r = session.get(url, headers=headers) rv1 = r.cookies
vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r.text)[0] data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers,cookies=rv1 , data=data_a).text nrj=json.loads(nr) nr = nrj['Content'] r2 = re.findall(r'(?s)value=\"(.*?)\"', nr)[0] data_a ={'__RequestVerificationToken': r2 , 'Username': 'Addonfesta' , 'Password' : 'addonfesta2017'} nr1 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/Account/Login', headers=headers,cookies = rv1 , data=data_a) print nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'] rasp = re.findall('ASPXAUTH_v2=(.*?);', nr1.headers['Set-Cookie'])[0] rv1['.ASPXAUTH_v2'] = rasp data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr3 = requests.post('http://kbagi.com/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=%s'%vfile , headers=headers, cookies = rv1 , data=data_a).text r3 = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr3)[0] print r3 return r3

[B][I][COLOR lime] · CARRERA 1 [/COLOR][/B][/I]
item.thumbnail: http://www.mx1onboard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Captura-de-pantalla-2017-01-19-a-las-08.25.10-410x300.png http://www.motobergamo035.it/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/IMG_4400.jpg getUrl #$pyFunction import re , requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url='http://diskokosmiko.mx/josele89/f1-motos-carreras-90233/2018-mxgp-of-patagonia-argentina-rd-1-mxgp-race-1720p,2067958,list,1,1.mp4' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ''} r = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text vfile , vtoken = re.findall('action/DownloadFile.*?fileId.*?value="(.*?)".*?Token".*?value="(.*?)"', r)[0] #print data_a ref = url headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': ref,'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest'} data_a ={'fileId': vfile , '__RequestVerificationToken': vtoken} nr = requests.post('http://diskokosmiko.mx/action/DownloadFile?location=fi&f=2067958', headers=headers, data=data_a).text movie = re.findall('DownloadUrl":"(.*?)"', nr)[0] print movie return movie
